name: Circles Battle
description:
Multiplayer game 1 vs 1, colorful graphics, defeat enemies and summon boss onto opponent area ! Shoot them all !!!

- Press E for buy extra life

- Press A / Z to spend money for summon boss onto your opponent area ( When multiplayer will be available )

This is a game for 42 Ready Player Hackaton made by 42 Entrepreneurs ! 

We just made this game in 3 days, at the moment it's just a demo and multiplayer mode is not active but check the video for more details ! 

Music by Kevin Macleod

Developed by Ludovic Brun & Camille Alin 

And THANKS to 42 entrepreneurs for this Hackaton ! It was fun !!!!!
